Kaushik Pradhan

BS-MS Dual Degree Student
Department of Earth Sciences, IISER Kolkata
kkp16ms169@iiserkol.ac.in

About Me

I am a final year student of the BS-MS dual degree program at Indian Institute of Science Education and Research Kolkata majoring in Geological Sciences and will be graduating in July 2021. Through the application of knowledge gained from quantitative disciples and programming, I am working with Prof. Supriyo Mitra on seismology to understand the earthquakes, sub-surface through which earthquakes propagate and interested in working on the projects that make our planet dynamic.

I am looking for PhD programs to carry forward the research in seismology.

Research

  • Project 1: Back-projection technique to understand the spatio-temporal evolution of rupture.
  • Project 2: High resolution crustal structure using ambient noise in the north western Himalaya.
  • Project 2: Lg wave propagation and attenuation characteristics of the north western Himalaya.
